mapper.sql: INDIV_CD indivCd , GROUP_CD groupCd , UP_INDIV_CD upIndivCd , INDIV_CD_NM indivCdNm , INDIV_CD_SORT_SN indivCdSortSn , INDIV_CD_CHG_YN indivCdChgYn , INDIV_CD_VL_FRST indivCdVlFrst , INDIV_CD_VL_SCNDRY indivCdVlScndry , INDIV_CD_VL_THIRD indivCdVlThird , INDIV_CD_EXPLN indivCdExpln , RGTR_ID rgtrId , MDFR_ID mdfrId , REG_DT regDt , MDFCN_DT mdfcnDt , DEL_YN delYn
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM
ORDER BY UP_INDIV_CD , INDIV_CD_SORT_SN ASC
LIMIT #{firstIndex},#{recordCountPerPage}
mapper.insert:
SELECT DECODE(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(INDIV_CD))+1,0),0,1,MAX(TO_NUMBER(INDIV_CD))+1) FROM TB_CMMN_INDIV_CD WHERE GROUP_CD = #{groupCd}
INSERT INTO TB_CMMN_INDIV_CD ( INDIV_CD , UP_INDIV_CD , GROUP_CD , INDIV_CD_NM , INDIV_CD_EXPLN , INDIV_CD_VL_FRST , INDIV_CD_VL_SCNDRY , INDIV_CD_VL_THIRD , INDIV_CD_SORT_SN , INDIV_CD_CHG_YN , RGTR_ID , MDFR_ID , REG_DT , MDFCN_DT , DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{indivCd} , NVL(#{upIndivCd},#{indivCd}) , #{groupCd} , #{indivCdNm} , #{indivCdExpln} , #{indivCdVlFrst} , #{indivCdVlScndry} , #{indivCdVlThird} , #{indivCdSortSn} , #{indivCdChgYn} , #{rgtrId} , #{mdfrId} , SYSDATETIME , SYSDATETIME , 'N' )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_CMMN_INDIV_CD SET INDIV_CD_NM = #{indivCdNm} , INDIV_CD_EXPLN = #{indivCdExpln} , INDIV_CD_VL_FRST = #{indivCdVlFrst} , INDIV_CD_VL_SCNDRY = #{indivCdVlScndry} , INDIV_CD_VL_THIRD = #{indivCdVlThird} ,
INDIV_CD_SORT_SN = #{indivCdSortSn} , INDIV_CD_CHG_YN = #{indivCdChgYn} , MDFR_ID = #{mdfrId} , MDFCN_DT = SYSDATETIME WHERE INDIV_CD = #{indivCd}
UPDATE TB_CMMN_INDIV_CD SET DEL_YN = 'N' , MDFR_ID = #{mdfrId} , MDFCN_DT = SYSDATETIME WHERE INDIV_CD = #{indivCd}
mapper.select: SELECT INDIV_CD indivCd , INDIV_CD_NM indivCdNm FROM TB_CMMN_INDIV_CD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND UP_INDIV_CD = #{upIndivCd} ORDER BY INDIV_CD_SORT_SN ASC
SELECT INDIV_CD indivCd , INDIV_CD_NM indivCdNm FROM TB_CMMN_INDIV_CD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND INDIV_CD != GROUP_CD AND GROUP_CD = #{groupCd} ORDER BY INDIV_CD_SORT_SN ASC
